content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ETCD
      operator: equal_to
      value: UNPLAN
    - name: ELEMENT
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000009
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Verify that ELEMENT value is blank when ETCD is equal to UNPLAN
Outcome:
  Message: ELEMENT variable has a non-null value when ETCD has a value of 'UNPLAN'
  Output Variables:
    - ETCD
    - ELEMENT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0152
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The name of the Element. If ETCD has a value of 'UNPLAN'
                  then ELEMENT should be null.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 5.3 Specification
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - SE

json.Description: Verify that ELEMENT value is blank when ETCD is equal to UNPLAN

Outcome.Message: ELEMENT variable has a non-null value when ETCD has a value of 'UNPLAN'

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The name of the Element. If ETCD has a value of 'UNPLAN' then ELEMENT should be null.
